questions.question: Did you feel disturbed by the warning?

Would you like to have more 
 warning channels for the same event in the future (e.g. additionally via SMS or alarm sound)?

Would you like to see a 
 more intense warning (e.g. additional channel, louder/brighter) for the same event in the future?

Was the presentation of the visual warning 
 (color, flashing vs. not flashing) appropriate?
Was the presentation of sound/no sound appropriate?

Was the presentation of 
 mobile warning/no mobile warning appropriate?
